REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to liability for unlawful discriminatory practices based upon the conduct of an employee or agent
Summary: Relates to liability for unlawful discriminatory practices based upon the conduct of an employee or agent; provides that an employer, licensing agency, employment agency, or labor organization shall be liable for an unlawful discriminatory practice based upon the conduct of an employee or agent where the employee or agent exercised managerial or supervisory responsibility or the conduct was carried out by a non-managerial or non-supervisory employee and such conduct was not stopped or corrected.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to liability for unlawful discriminatory practices based upon the conduct of an employee or agent
